Text.Page:
Imps are b-bound by magic to protect the faeries. The b-beasts of the forest turned against the fey; my b-brothers b-battered them b-back.

Strange b-blue b-beasts invade and our numbers shrink from b-battle and illness. Too many b-brothers lost.

I don't know if Jurik and Rabak have fallen to the sickness or they're just too stubborn; they'd stay out there until the sickness takes them.

You, you can help. Federation , find Jurik!

Inmaru b-bleats too much. We're b-brave fighters. No b-beasts can stop us.

And many b-beasts still need stopping.
